errors.provider-unauthorized: The requested method and/or account has not been authorized by the user.
errors.provider-unsupported-method: The Provider does not support the requested method.
errors.provider-disconnected: The Provider is disconnected from all chains.
errors.provider-chain-disconnected: The Provider is not connected to the requested chain.
errors.provider-chain-invalid: This chain is not supported, please select an available chain.
errors.provider-invalid-request: JSON is not a valid request object standard
errors.provider-json-rpc-version-not-supported: Version of JSON-RPC protocol is not supported non-standard
errors.provider-wrapper-method-not-found: provider not exist or hasn't this method
errors.address-invalid: The smart contract address is not correct.
errors.address-not-found: No product with this address was found.
errors.can-not-create-initialize-data: Initialize data can't be created for this product.

page-404.title: We are sorry. There was an error loading and the page is not responding. Reload the page or check back later

product-card.erc20-transfer-ownership-tooltip: Transfer token smart contract ownership to other address.
product-card.erc20-approve-tooltip: Approve other address to spend tokens from your address.
product-card.erc20-transfer-tooltip: Transfer tokens from your address to other address.
product-card.erc20-transfer-from-tooltip: Transfer tokens from third party address with approve on you to spend tokens to other address.
product-card.erc20-mint-tooltip: Mint new tokens and increase total token supply.
product-card.erc20-burn-tooltip: Burn tokens from your address and decrease total token supply.
product-card.erc20-cap-tooltip: Token with predefined maximum token supply.
product-card.erc721-transfer-ownership-tooltip: Transfer token smart contract ownership to other address.
product-card.erc721-approve-tooltip: Approve other address to spend specific NFT token from your address.
product-card.erc721-approve-all-tooltip: Approve other address to spend all NFT tokens from your address.
product-card.erc721-safe-transfer-tooltip: NFT transfer from one address to another.
product-card.erc721-enum-tooltip: Implements an optional extension of ERC721 defined in the EIP that adds enumerability of all the token ids in the contract as well as all token ids owned by each account. Enumerability adds additional view finctions like total token supply, function that returns the tokenId of an NFT that is stored at the provided index, function that returns the tokenId of an NFT that is stored at a particular index of the owner's list of tokens.

post-item-page-checkout.have-product-input-tooltip-txt: You can edit contracts that you already have
post-item-page-checkout.decrease-percent-tooltip: The price of the product is reduced by a specified amount after each purchase.
post-item-page-checkout.cashback-percent-tooltip: A specified percentage of the current price translates into rewards.
post-item-page-checkout.minimal-price-tooltip: The minimum price of the product, can not be lower than the specified value
post-item-page-checkout.reward-tooltip: The specified number of tokens will be transferred to the buyer's address after the purchase
post-item-page-checkout.cashback-tooltip: The specified number of tokens will be distributed among all participants of farming
post-item-page-checkout.buy-description-lbl: First, the contract will be deployed, and then you can configure it

erc721-common.description: Deploy your product on chain. The first time you will need to make two transactions. The first will allow us to take payment for the product, the second will perform the deployment of the smart contract in the network. Afterwards, only one transaction will be necessary.
erc721-common.deploy-success-message: Congratulations! Youâ€™ve just deployed your contract for Non Fungible Tokens!
